name: Gourmet Supply
description:
Hardware acceleration recommended for smooth in-browser gameplay. Windows build also available.

Made for Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

2022. The war.

Kyiv is under fire. Businesses shut down, people flee the country. Territorial Defense polices the city and prepares for Russian assault. Restaurant workers volunteer to feed them with what has left: pricey gourmet meals. However, army's schedule is very strict — food must arrive on time. Hurry up!

The game is based on an rumor of Kyiv's Territorial Defense Force eating lobsters from a local food market.

Assets from:
